title: Fragment, 13th–15th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: resist-printed on plain weave
description: Untreated fine plain weave ground with small-scale all-over design of squares formed by diagonally crossing lines of dots alternate, alternate squares enclosing concentric circles and rosette.  Design in tan and red against brown background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 13th–15th century.Medium: cotton
Technique: resist-printed on plain weave. 1939-13-4.
